Recompositions: Dreamers often lie.
A dream itself is but a shadow.
Dreams are toys.
If it be thus to dream, still let me sleep.
Friendship is constant in all things.
Keep thy friend under thy own lifeâ€™s key.
Words are easy, like the wind; faithful friends are hard to find
My lord, there needs no such apology.
Strengthen'd with what apology you think may make it probable need.
I beseech you remember.
Purpose is but the slave to memory.
Else your memory is bad, going o'er it erewhile.
Pluck from the memory a rooted sorrow.
Be just and fear not.
Be that thou know'st thou art and then thou art as great as that thou fear'st.
The best safety lies in fear.
Present fears are less than horrible imaginings.
Misery acquaints a man with strange bedfellows.
When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalions.
Give sorrow words; the grief that does not speak knits up the o-er wrought heart and bids it break.
Sleep that relieves the weary laborer and heals hurt minds.
Sleep, the main course in life's feast, and the most nourishing.
You lack the season of all natures, sleep.
O sleep! O gentle sleep!
Love sought is good, but given unsought, is better.
Love is not love that alters when it alteration finds.
Go hand in hand, not one before another.
All that glitters is not gold.
Adieu! I have too grieved a heart to take a tedious leave!
